text: You will find information regarding stored procedures, and descriptions on how to configure the mapping for the Database agents to the respective fields in the Database table and vice versa under this section. The section contains the following subsections: Tables and Stored Procedures SQL Server Considerations Inter-Workflow Communication, Using Database Agents Mapping Assignments between Database Fields and UDR Fields
title: Database Agents General Information - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
